definition: to have faith in/to believe in/to have confidence in/to respect
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: I really admire your courage in biting your toe nail in public.
sentences.chinese: 我真信服你敢于在平易近众场所咬脚趾甲的勇气。

sentences.english: Astrology is a trusted science and is being practiced for over 4000 years," said an affidavit filed by Dr R Ramakrishna, deputy drug controller (India), west zone.
sentences.chinese: 占星术是被信服的科学，已被实践了4000多年。

sentences.english: In Ghana today, one in two people has access to telecom services.
sentences.chinese: 今天在加纳，每2人中就有1人使用电信服务。
也许您还不太信服我刚才介绍的这些技术。

sentences.english: The grand old man was not convinced.
sentences.chinese: 然而那位老前辈并未信服。

sentences.english: Now, some of you may be sufficiently cynical to say, "That could be explained in other ways.
sentences.chinese: 有些不信服的同学可能会说，“这可能是有别的原因。

sentences.english: Compulsion will never result in convincing them .
sentences.chinese: 强迫永远不会使他们信服。

sentences.english: Try to come up with a principled, compelling counterargument.
sentences.chinese: 尝试去形成一个有原则的，令人信服的反驳观点。

sentences.english: Lippi also admitted his team were far from convincing.
sentences.chinese: 里皮也承认，他的队伍还远远不能让人信服。

sentences.english: Now, Somalia has telecom services among the best inAfrica.
sentences.chinese: 如今，索马里有着非洲大陆最优质的电信服务。

sentences.english: But numbers and market penetration alone aren't enough to convince us.
sentences.chinese: 但是数字和市场渗透率并不足以使我们信服。

sentences.english: I'm gonna go in. I'll be convincing on the podium, you know?'
sentences.chinese: 我会在指挥台上让人们信服的。

sentences.english: But much of the research is convincing.
sentences.chinese: 但大部分的研究是令人信服的。
英格兰队的胜利不能令人信服。

sentences.english: This means that Tagalog is every bit as valid and valuable as English.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着他加禄语和英语一样有价值一样令人信服。

sentences.english: The research on the impact of this meditation is fertile, and convincing.
sentences.chinese: 关于此类冥想的影响的研究相当丰富，且令人信服。

definition: to accept wholeheartedly/to embrace/to be won over
to have a whole new level of respect for sb or sth/to sit up and take notice (of sb's improved performance etc)
to admire/to look up to/to respect sb greatly
to believe firmly without any doubt (idiom)/absolute certainty about sth
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to feel deep veneration for sb (idiom)
to treat sb favorably/to view in a new light
